p: Cells that has been harvested was processed for RNA isolation that will be used for futher assay. It was done by using the Aurum™ Total RNA mini Kit (Bio-Rad, 732-6820). RT-qPCR (Clever, GTC96S) was used to analyze the gene expression include the β-actin gene that constitutively expressed ( Afifah et al., 2019; Widowati et al., 2019b). Table 1 was shown the primer sequence and Table 2 was shown RNA concentration and purity.
